indicator_reference_number.title: Indicator Reference Number
indicator_reference_number.description: Unique reference number to identify each indicator.

indicator.title: Indicator
indicator.description: Name of Quality of Life indicator.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Indicators are grouped into ten “themes” to aid sorting, searching and browsing the indicators.

survey_question.title: Survey Question
survey_question.description: All questions are pre-fixed with Q17. The last three digits represent the number of the question(s) from which the indicator is derived. The number is that found on the online survey and questionnaire in 2017.

sample_size.title: Sample Size
sample_size.description: The sample size for the indicator taking into account missing data.

statistic.title: Statistic
statistic.description: The point estimate of the indicator from the survey.

standard_error.title: Standard Error
standard_error.description: A measure of the accuracy of the point estimate. The bootstrap method was used to calculate the standard error.

lower_confidence_limit.title: Lower Confidence Limit
lower_confidence_limit.description: The lower bound of the 95% confidence interval of indicator from the survey.

upper_confidence_limit.title: Upper Confidence Limit
upper_confidence_limit.description: The upper bound of the 95% confidence interval of the indicator from the survey

polarity_high_is.title: Polarity (high is …)
polarity_high_is.description: An indication of whether a high 'Statistic' percentage is good or bad.

p_value_2_tailed_t_test_unequal_variance.title:
p value (2 tailed t-test unequal variances) 
(Bristol Average versus Most Deprived 10%)

deprivation_gap_bristol_average_versus_m.title:
Deprivation Gap
(Bristol Average versus Most Deprived 10%)
deprivation_gap_bristol_average_versus_m.description: The difference between the Bristol Average percentage and the Most Deprived 10%.

deprivation_gap_significance_bristol_ave.title:
Deprivation Gap Significance 
(Bristol Average versus Most Deprived 10%)
deprivation_gap_significance_bristol_ave.description: The significance of the percentage change in the gap since the previous survey.
